elements.name: Verify Money Control Login Page

steps.name: I am on the money control login page
I enter the Username and Password on the login page
I verify the Tinu on the login page

name: Verify Money Control Login Page
description: As a user I would like to test whether I can enter the username and password on the login frame

elements.name: Verify shareholder details graph

steps.name: I am on the on the stock price and quote page for a given stock
I navigated to the shareholding section
I captured the screenshot of the "promoter" graph
I verify "promoter" graph legends
I verify the color codes, labels and height of the promoter graph

name: Verify promoter holding and pledge graph details on the money control stock price page for a given stock
description: As a user I would like to verify the legends, colour codes and data labels on the promoter holding vs pledge graph

elements.name: Verify shareholder details graph

steps.name: I am on the on the stock price and quote page for a given stock
I navigated to the shareholding section
I captured the screenshot of the "summary" graph
I verify "summary" graph legends
I verify shareholding percentage and graph fill colour

name: Verify share holder summary graph details on the money control stock price page for a given stock
description: As a user I would like to verify the legends, colour codes and share percentage on the share holding summary graph

elements.name: Get the driver details

steps.name: I have created a request playload Ergast Developer API
I submit the request
I validate the response status code is 200
I record the 'driverId' returned in the response on 'DriversId' excel
I verify the given drivers nationality is correct
I capture all the driverIds whose nationality is 'British'
I Capture the givenNames who are born between 1920 to 1925

name: Retrieve and validate the driver details
description: As a user I would like to retrive all the driver details through API call in json format and then validate the results.
